title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.3 - Contents of the charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.3 - Contents of the charge

State Regulations
A charge shall contain the following: (a) the full name and address of the party
making the charge; (b) the name of
the employee organization against whom the charge is made; and
(c) a clear and concise statement of the
facts constituting the alleged violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
206.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
